#Assignment 02
##Exercise 1:
##1.1

```{r}
filter(gapminder, country %in% c( "Albania", "Denmark", "China") & year ==1970:1979)
```

##1.2

```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country %in% c ("Albania", "Denmark", "China") & year == 1970:1979)%>%
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```

##1.3

```{r}
gapminder %>%
  mutate(dropLifeExp <- lag(lifeExp))
```

##1.4

```{R}
gapminder %>%
  mutate(gdpPercap <- max(gdpPercap))
```

##1.5
```{R}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada") %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = lifeExp, y = gdpPercap)+
  geom_point(alpha = .3, size = 2.5)
```

##Exercise 2:
```{R}
library(palmerpenguins)
```

##2.1
```{R}
palmerpenguins::penguins %>%
  summarize(mu = mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm),
            sigma = sd(penguins$flipper_length_mm))

```

##2.2
```{R}
palmerpenguins::penguins %>%
  group_by(islands, flipper_length_mm) %>% summarize(n = n())%>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = islands, y = flipper_lenght_mm)+
  geom_point(alpha = .3, size = 2.5) +
    geom_bar()
```
